abproj_projd: Improvement of Driving License System in Lao PDR
abproj_assigd: Consultancy Services for improving the quality of the driving licensing system, undertaking and to provide technical assistance to Department of Transport, Ministry of Public Works and Transport in Lao PDR.
abproj_introd: The Department of Transport (DOT), Ministry of Public Works and Transport, Lao PDR has approved and supported the Driving License System Improvement Program under the United Nations Road Safety Fund (UNRSF) proposal and the project proposal submitted by the United Nations ESCAP. Driving license issuing system in Laos PDR by signing an agreement between UNESCAP and the Department of Transport, Lao PDR under a Letter of Agreement (LoA). which aims to jointly reduce traffic problems on the road injury and deaths in Lao PDR by improving road safety awareness and knowledge of all drivers. including introducing an online driving license issuing system and aims for cooperation in leveraging knowledge and experience from developed countries with good highway safety. To improve driving skills, training, safety education, there is a need to develop and deploy the online application system and Driving test system (E-Driving) for Savannakhet Province as a pilot, and results from the trial of the developed system will be summarized and expect to be used throughout the country in the Lao PDR. Therefore, the Department of Transport, Ministry of Public Works and Transport organized a project to improve and develop the driving license system in Lao PDR.
abdot_rold: The Department of Transport serves as a management entity on behalf of Ministry of Public Works and Transport for researching, planning, and managing in macro scale about tasks related to land transportation in the country, as well as coordinate with all Provincial Department of Public Works and Transport in actual implementation of the tasks.
abdot_resp1_desc: Enforce legilation, decree, regulations of higher goverment and regulation of Ministry of Public Works and Transport
abdot_resp2_desc: Learn, understand the Party and government's policy, stategic plan of the Ministry of Public Works and Transport regarding land transport
abdot_resp3_desc: Draft stategic plans, workplans, projects and policies regarding land tranport for proposing to the Minister of Public Works and Transport to get approval, as well as implementing the plans
abdot_resp4_desc: Manage and audit technical standard of building infrastructure activities and projects related to land transport, which as distributed to central and local levels
abdot_resp5_desc: Manage transportation for passenger, goods, logistic, transportation vehicles, traffic, driving, road safety, publications, associations, communities, and businesses related to land transport to be effective and efficient
abdot_resp6_desc: Encourage innovation of government staffs for analyze and research science, technique and technology, as well as publish, train, and utilize results of the research  for the benefits of land transport
abdot_resp7_desc: Manage, administer documents, publications, assets, and source for income to be used in land transport works
abdot_resp8_desc: Collect, comply, and utilize available budget, equipments, vehicles, and facilities of the department that already approved by the Ministry of Public Works and Transport
abdot_resp9_desc: Coordinate, cooperate, and exchange lesson learnt with related agencies both domestically and internationaly, based on agreement from the Ministry of Public Works and Transport
abdot_resp10_desc: Budget planning, manage, and utilize available fund, equipments, vehicles, and facilities of the department that already approved by Ministry of Public Works and Transport
abdot_resp11_desc: Encourage, monitor, audit and evaluate activities and works done in the department and each division on a regular basis.
abdot_resp12_desc: Summary and report activities and works done to the Minister of Public Works and Transport, then obtain further direction
abdot_resp13_desc: Serve as a secretariat for the national commitee for load safety (Decree 61/ນຍ, dated 4 February 2022)

dotapp_intro: DoT Smart App is a mobile application, to make it easy for public to access information from Department of Transport, as well as learning online about the driving course before take the real exam and other feature related to driving license. We hope the public can gain more knowledge about driving and road safety thru this app.
dotapp_feature: DoT Smart App has various features which aim to be serve all users for all task related to driving license. which include following features:
dotapp_feature1_desc: At your own time and place, learn about traffic rule, sign, road safety, driving techniques, ethics, Maintenance ...etc
dotapp_feature2_desc: Try doing a theory test to familiarize the test questions and format for your selected license type
dotapp_feature3_desc: Access news update and announcement about driving license and activities from Department of Transport
dotapp_feature4_desc: Select your convenient time to take the driving license exam after your have fulfill all requirements
dotapp_feature5_desc: Check your driving license exam result after you have taken the exam and see your Driving license on the App!
dotapp_feature6_desc: Get notified when your driving license is about expire
proc_det: Breif Driving license procedure (with new DoT Smart App) are following
proc_det1: For license types A, A1, A2, A3
proc_det11: Riders/Drivers can choose to learn theory and practice riding/driving by themselves, or attending a driving school. The theory lessons are available in the DoT Smart App and Driving handbooks. The Handbooks can be purchased from District Office of Public Works and Transport, Provincial Vehicle and Driving License Management Unit (or its branches), or Driving schools.
proc_det12: Then the riders/driver can make appointment and follow instruction in the DoT Smart App, or manually apply for exam at the District Office of Public Works and Transport, or Provincial Vehicle and Driving License Management Unit (or its branches) the they belong to.
proc_det13: Come to take the exam according to the date and time of the appointment, at the Provincial Vehicle and Driving License Management Unit or authorized exam location. The exam will be 2 parts: Theory exam and Practical exam. The examinees must bring their original ID card and related documents for authentication before taking the exam.
proc_det14: After passed the exam and fullfill all conditions, Officers will issue the driving license to the riders/drivers on the same day (in case some authorized exam location cannot print driving license card, the riders/drivers can come back to get the driving license card within 1 week)
proc_det2: For license types: B, C, C1, C2, D, D1, D2, E, E1
proc_det21: Driviers must attend a driving school to learn the theory and practice real driving. They must fullfill all prerequisite conditions and learnt enough number of hours for theory and practical, according to defined curriculum of that license type.
proc_det22: They can learn the theory from the Smart App, which can count toward number of hours needed.
proc_det23: Then the driving school will enter the driver's detail into driving license system for application and make appointment for exam
proc_det24: The driver will know their student ID, which can be used to identity with the system
proc_det25: Come to take the exam according to the date and time of the appointment, at the Provincial Vehicle and Driving License Management Unit or authorized exam location. The exam will be 2 parts: Theory exam and Practical exam. The examinees must bring their original ID card and related documents for authentication before taking the exam.
proc_det26: After passed the exam and fullfill all conditions, Officers will issue the driving license to the riders/drivers on the same day.
